name: Jikuu Tantei DD: Maboroshi no Lorelei
summary: Sci fi/noir detective-themed FMV first-person adventure game released for the PlayStation and Saturn in 1996 (Japan only). The game stars time-travelling vampire private eye Raizo (the titular "Dracula Detective") who travels from his native 2238 to 1939 Nazi Germany in order to find a client's missing father.
